title: gilee
author: gilee
created_time: May 10, 2023, 11:25:56 AMLast edit: May 10, 2023, 07:00:06 PM by gilee
content: Hello. So I have Trust Wallet account with $34 USDT balance. I do not understand how to use and I need TRX to sell USDT. I would like to sell my account or at least buy $2 worth TRX to sell USDT by myself.

comments.author: gilee
comments.body: I know. I do not have TRX and that's why asking for help.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Post your TRX addy here, tell me how much you need exactly and I'll send you some.

comments.body: Quote from: gilee on May 10, 2023, 06:59:24 PMToo late:( I was scammed by member TheChin0s. @gilee if what your saying is true, you should open a Scam Accusation against him, show proof and DT members will paint him red for sure.

comments.author: gilee
comments.body: He deleted Telegram messages and I forgot to make at least a few printscreens:( And he deleted his post here. I can not find his account anymore. So what I can do? I guess nothing. I was stupid and deserve this. But I believe in karma
